title: masturbation chat in game
body: Is it reportable for people to be saying things like "I'm gonna hurry and jack off while game loads, plz hold out your champ picks to 1 second"? This has happened in a couple of my games and sometimes they move their champion to lane after 2 minutes then don't actually start playing til like 3 or 4 minutes into the game so we can't remake even.

replies.body: I mean it is AFKing, but seriously, these people are idiots, if you do that don't start a game
i jack it left handed, so i just kinda keep clearing camps until i'm done, ya dig?
stop crying like a pussy lol
dude it really has hurt some of my games lol

> [{quoted}](name=SpiritOfFizz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Abmi2WKc,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-01T13:17:41.059+0000)
>
> dude it really has hurt one of my games lol

fixed.

pretty much every post that whines about something. most of the time you can just go into someones match history, even on the account they're posting on, and there it is, the champion they're complaining about, on the winning team, which is never the same as OP's, and they're fed af

"some of my games" yeah totes, happens in every other game even of mine, its practically an epidemic, riot are in contact with the FBI everyday because of it....
Are they ruining the game? Yes, afking. Then report them.
